subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: The world champion Reese Hoffa won the shot put at the Olympic track and field trials on Saturday, but refrained from his usual celebration of nibbling on a turkey leg in triumph.
snippet: The world champion Reese Hoffa won the shot put at the Olympic track and field trials on Saturday, but refrained from his usual celebration of nibbling on a turkey leg in triumph.
